trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFEXPANSIONGUIDE1_00261_TEMPLEKNIGHT01580_000_000<tab>None shall pass through the Gates of Judgement who have not been granted leave to do so.
TEXT_CMNDEFEXPANSIONGUIDE1_00261_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>In order to enter Ishgard, you must first meet the following requirements:
TEXT_CMNDEFEXPANSIONGUIDE1_00261_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>※You must have completed the main scenario quest “Before the Dawn.”
TEXT_CMNDEFEXPANSIONGUIDE1_00261_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>※ You must be currently undertaking the quest “Coming to Ishgard.”

TEXT_CMNDEFEXPANSIONGUIDE1_00261_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>To review your quest progression, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from the main menu, followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Journal<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
